column2: itworks!, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have herpes and couldn't find anything to help the pain and clear the sores up. My mother has told me that camphophenique can be used for a lot of things, so I thought why not? It is Heaven in a bottle! It stings like crazy at first, but once that is over no more pain and it dries up the sores! Fantastic stuff!

Just to let everyone know.. As a child my mother always picked up stray animals with mange or something wrong with it. She would always keep Campho Phenique on hand. It works for everything.  So it is very safe to use on animals.

column9: Great stuff for a lot of reason. I even got my grandson to use it with ease.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month
column9: I got a painful boil above my ear. I tried many of the home remedies and nothing really worked or gave me real relief. I then read about Campho-Phenique. I went out and purchased it immediately. True to form it burned like the dickens, but it worked. The pain was lessened and although the package said don't dandage, the location of my boil made it impossible to leave on overnight without securing it. I put a fair amount of product on a cotton ball put a large bandage on my ear just so it would hold the cotton ball in place and went to bed. The next morning a whitehead! I had this stupid thing for days and nothing brought it to a head. I am pregnant so I don't want to lance it so I will continue to put the product on it so that it will break out on its own.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: i get boils once in awhile but this time i got one on my face! ugh! desperate to get rid of it quickly i started reaserching online. i decided to try a remedy suggested of CAMPHO-PHENIQUE. which you can get over the counter for less than 5.00 and is usually used for insect bites? skeptial i decied to try it because i was desperate. i put a tiny dab on the pad of a band aid....it took the pain away IMMEDIATLY and after just a few hours puss was running down my cheek and the core (which i have been struggeling with for days) was brought to the surface! just wanted to get the word out, this worked wonders for me! only draw back is that the campho is REALLY stinky. but small price to pay for instant pain relief and the results after just a few hours.

column9: I was just diagnosed with SHINGLES on my back.  They are  very PAINFUL!  I put Campho Phenique on and WOW! The pain disappeared and the rash is going away after two days!  USE THIS!  It is Wonderful for Shingles.

column2: Lulu, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: I apply campho-phenique whenever I burn myself.  It prevents blistering and scarring and anesthetizes the area just a few seconds after it's applied.  I keep it in a cabinet next to the kitchen stove so it's handy when I need it.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I had a sore between my toes, I tried everything from hydrogen peroxide to neosporin. I applied campho-phenique with a q-tip swab and in just a few hours it was much improved.Within 24 hours, the redness is gone and the pain is gone.

column2: aramire1, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This is my 2nd cold sore I have gotten in 20 days! Once i noticed the cold sore start to turn into a blister I started putting orajel($8) on it. That acutally stopped the pain. The next day it got a little bigger and i went back to the store and got Releev ($17) and Campho-Phenique ($5). At first I put on a little campho-phenique but stop because it is like an ointment that stinks and made the sore more obvious because it was shiny. The Releev kept the sore the same size and kept it from getting bigger, but when I went to sleep I applied a lot of Campho- Phenique and when I woke up the sore was already drying up. I was too excited. I keep putting it on and now its barely visible. Keep in mind the cold sore popped up on Fri and today (Sun) you can hardly tell. I am just mad that I spent money on Releev when the $5 Campho-Phenique did a much better job!
